sentences.en: Personally, I answer to the latter question with a quote from linguist Max Weinreich, who wrote a multivolume history of Yiddish.
sentences.cn: 就我个人来说，我要引用曾经撰写一部多卷意第绪语(Yiddish)史的语言学家马克斯·魏因赖希 (Max Weinreich) 的话来回答最后一个问题。

sentences.en: So he planned a comprehensive, multivolume work to convince scientists and the world.
sentences.cn: 所以他计划写出一本无所不包、卷帙浩繁的著作以征服科学家们和这个世界。

sentences.en: When accessing a new tape of a multivolume partition, the current block size is incorrect .
sentences.cn: 在访问多卷分区的新磁带时，当前的块大小不正确。

sentences.en: When accessing a new tape of a multivolume partition, the current block size is incorrect.
sentences.cn: 在访问多卷分区的新磁带时, 当前的块大小不正确.
